description:
Greyson is one of Shiloh's friends. I think they might have tried dating, but now seem to just be 'buddies'. Shiloh and Greyson filmed a 'peep' type video for us, and that airs next week. When I saw how adorably sexy he was I knew he needed to get into the studio.
Everything got filmed out of order, so I had already seen him in action and was eager to get him for some photos and a solo.
Greyson is a smart dude, just about to finish up college and head to grad school. I get the vibe that he isn't quite used to the attention he gets. He grew up kind of a bookworm, but has blossomed into a hot athletic stud.
He has a big 'ole smile that will charm you, an amazing ass, and the dude can shoot about 5 feet! Very cool cum shot on this one as he soaks the camera..and me!
title: Greyson - Solo
